Build-Depends-Indep: doxygen, libx11-dev, libxrandr-dev, libgraphicsmagick++1-dev | libmagick++-dev <!nocheck>, libfftw3-dev | fftw3-dev <!nocheck>, libimath-dev <!nocheck>, libheif-dev <!nocheck>, libopencv-dev, libminc-dev, libtiff-dev, libcurl4-gnutls-dev | libcurl4-dev <!nocheck>, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-fonts-recommended
Package-List: cimg-dev deb math optional arch=all cimg-doc deb doc optional arch=all cimg-examples deb doc optional arch=all
Testsuite-Triggers: build-essential, fftw3-dev, libcurl4-dev, libcurl4-gnutls-dev, libfftw3-dev, libgraphicsmagick++1-dev, libheif-dev, libimath-dev, libmagick++-dev, libopenexr-dev
